entry.em: ..COLD WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY

entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY AND COLD
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 6 ABOVE
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 20
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF FLURRIES
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 7 ABOVE
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY, COLD WITH HIGHS AROUND 15
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 3 BELOW IN THE MORNING

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 11
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
LOWS AROUND 20

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 30

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
